snippet.title: BB4CPC - Amstrad CPC Homebrew
snippet.description:
While Bubble Bobble already had a pretty damn good port for the Amstrad CPC by Firebird in 1987, CNGSoft decided that in there's room for improvement, thus giving us the best Amstrad version of the classic arcade game yet: BB4CPC (Abbreviated as Bubble Bobble for CPC), released in 2011 as a free homebrew.

CPC Game Reviews gave it a 9/10, saying that "BB4CPC delivers vastly improved graphics (better colours and level design), the arcade music, and most importantly, coin-op perfect gameplay. This means that the gameplay and grab factor are now very high and that the disadvantages of the previous version (bad collision detection, drab colours and very few sound effects) are no longer present."

In case you're wondering, the Firebird conversion got a 8/10 from the site.

Bubble Bobble (C) TAITO CORPORATION
BB4CPC developed by CNGSoft
